verses.verse: בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- old שְׁתֵּ֥ים <S%H8147><s%> she-Teim both עֶשְׂרֵ֛ה <S%H6240><s%> 'es-Reh ten שָׁנָ֖ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years מְנַשֶּׁ֣ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh בְמָלְכ֑וֹ <S%H4427><s%> ve-ma-le-Cho; when he began to reign וַחֲמִשִּׁ֤ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim fifty וְחָמֵשׁ֙ <S%H2568><s%> ve-cha-Mesh and five שָׁנָ֔ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah, years מָלַ֖ךְ <S%H4427><s%> ma-Lach and he reigned בִּירוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim. in Jerusalem

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as But did הָרַ֖ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD כְּתֽוֹעֲבוֹת֙ <S%H8441><s%> ke-to-'a-Vot like unto the abominations הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <S%H3423><s%> ho-Rish had cast out יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel

וַיָּ֗שָׁב <S%H7725><s%> vai-Ya-shov, again וַיִּ֙בֶן֙ <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven For he built אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- הַבָּמ֔וֹת <S%H1116><s%> hab-ba-Mot, the high places אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which נִתַּ֖ץ <S%H5422><s%> nit-Tatz had broken down יְחִזְקִיָּ֣הוּ <S%H2396><s%> ye-chiz-ki-Ya-hu Hezekiah אָבִ֑יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-Viv; his father וַיָּ֨קֶם <S%H6965><s%> vai-Ya-kem and he reared up מִזְבְּח֤וֹת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot altars לַבְּעָלִים֙ <S%H1168><s%> lab-be-'a-Lim for Baalim וַיַּ֣עַשׂ <S%H6213><s%> vai-Ya-'as and made אֲשֵׁר֔וֹת <S%H842><s%> a-she-Rot, groves וַיִּשְׁתַּ֙חוּ֙ <S%H7812><s%> vai-yish-Ta-chu and worshipped לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim, of heaven וַֽיַּעֲבֹ֖ד <S%H5647><s%> vai-ya-'a-Vod and served אֹתָֽם׃ <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam.

וּבָנָ֥ה <S%H1129><s%> u-va-Nah Also he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot altars בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house יְהוָ֑ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh; of the LORD אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֣ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar had said יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, whereof the LORD בִּירוּשָׁלִַ֥ם <S%H3389><s%> bi-ru-sha-Lim In Jerusalem יִֽהְיֶה־ <S%H1961><s%> yih-yeh- become שְּׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi shall my name לְעוֹלָֽם׃ <S%H5769><s%> le-'o-Lam. be for ever

וַיִּ֥בֶן <S%H1129><s%> vai-Yi-ven And he built מִזְבְּח֖וֹת <S%H4196><s%> miz-be-Chot altars לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol for all צְבָ֣א <S%H6635><s%> tze-Va for all the host הַשָּׁמָ֑יִם <S%H8064><s%> hash-sha-Ma-yim; of heaven בִּשְׁתֵּ֖י <S%H8147><s%> bish-Tei in the two חַצְר֥וֹת <S%H2691><s%> chatz-Rot courts בֵּית־ <S%H1004><s%> beit- of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh. of the LORD

וְהוּא֩ <S%H1931><s%> ve-Hu he הֶעֱבִ֨יר <S%H5674><s%> he-'e-Vir to pass through אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- בָּנָ֤יו <S%H1121><s%> ba-Nav his children בָּאֵשׁ֙ <S%H784><s%> ba-'Esh the fire בְּגֵ֣י <S%H1516><s%> be-Gei in the valley בֶן־ <S%H1121><s%> ven- of the son הִנֹּ֔ם <S%H2011><s%> hin-Nom, of Hinnom וְעוֹנֵ֤ן <S%H6049><s%> ve-'o-Nen also he observed times וְנִחֵשׁ֙ <S%H5172><s%> ve-ni-Chesh and used enchantments וְֽכִשֵּׁ֔ף <S%H3784><s%> ve-chish-Shef, and used witchcraft וְעָ֥שָׂה <S%H6213><s%> ve-'A-sah and dealt א֖וֹב <S%H178><s%> ov with a familiar spirit וְיִדְּעוֹנִ֑י <S%H3049><s%> ve-yid-de-'o-Ni; and with wizards הִרְבָּ֗ה <S%H7235><s%> hir-Bah, much לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot he wrought הָרַ֛ע <S%H7451><s%> ha-Ra' evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <S%H5869><s%> be-'ei-Nei in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <S%H3707><s%> le-hach-'i-So. to provoke him to anger

וַיָּ֕שֶׂם <S%H7760><s%> vai-Ya-sem And he set אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פֶּ֥סֶל <S%H6459><s%> Pe-sel a carved image הַסֶּ֖מֶל <S%H5566><s%> has-Se-mel the idol אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which עָשָׂ֑ה <S%H6213><s%> 'a-Sah; which he had made בְּבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> be-Veit in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֗ים <S%H430><s%> ha-'E-lo-Him, of God אֲשֶׁ֨ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher of which אָמַ֤ר <S%H559><s%> 'a-Mar had said אֱלֹהִים֙ <S%H430><s%> E-lo-Him of which God אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to דָּוִיד֙ <S%H1732><s%> da-Vid to David וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and to שְׁלֹמֹ֣ה <S%H8010><s%> she-lo-Moh and to Solomon בְנ֔וֹ <S%H1121><s%> ve-No, his son בַּבַּ֨יִת <S%H1004><s%> bab-Ba-yit In this house הַזֶּ֜ה <S%H2088><s%> haz-Zeh this וּבִֽירוּשָׁלִַ֗ם <S%H3389><s%> u-vi-ru-sha-Lim, and in Jerusalem אֲשֶׁ֤ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which בָּחַ֙רְתִּי֙ <S%H970><s%> ba-Char-ti young מִכֹּל֙ <S%H3605><s%> mik-Kol all שִׁבְטֵ֣י <S%H7626><s%> shiv-Tei before all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel אָשִׂ֥ים <S%H7760><s%> 'a-Sim will I put אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שְׁמִ֖י <S%H8034><s%> she-Mi my name לְעֵילֽוֹם׃ <S%H5865><s%> le-'ei-Lom. for ever

וְלֹ֣א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo and I will not אוֹסִ֗יף <S%H3254><s%> o-Sif, Neither will I any more לְהָסִיר֙ <S%H5493><s%> le-ha-Sir remove אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֶ֣גֶל <S%H7272><s%> Re-gel the foot יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel מֵעַל֙ <S%H5921><s%> me-'Al from out הָֽאֲדָמָ֔ה <S%H127><s%> ha-'a-da-Mah, of the land אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which הֶֽעֱמַ֖דְתִּי <S%H5975><s%> he-'e-Mad-ti which I have appointed לַאֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <S%H1><s%> la-'a-vo-tei-Chem; for your fathers רַ֣ק׀ <S%H7535><s%> rak but אִם־ <S%H518><s%> 'im- so that יִשְׁמְר֣וּ <S%H8104><s%> yish-me-Ru they will take heed לַעֲשׂ֗וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot, to do אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all אֲשֶׁ֣ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher which צִוִּיתִ֔ים <S%H6680><s%> tziv-vi-Tim, all that I have commanded לְכָל־ <S%H3605><s%> le-chol to all הַתּוֹרָ֛ה <S%H8451><s%> hat-to-Rah them according to the whole law וְהַֽחֻקִּ֥ים <S%H2706><s%> ve-ha-chuk-Kim and the statutes וְהַמִּשְׁפָּטִ֖ים <S%H4941><s%> ve-ham-mish-pa-Tim and the ordinances בְּיַד־ <S%H3027><s%> be-yad- by the hand מֹשֶֽׁה׃ <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh. of Moses

וַיֶּ֣תַע <S%H8582><s%> vai-Ye-ta' to err מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, So Manasseh אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- יְהוּדָ֖ה <S%H3063><s%> ye-hu-Dah Judah וְיֹשְׁבֵ֣י <S%H3427><s%> ve-yo-she-Vei and the inhabitants יְרוּשָׁלִָ֑ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim; of Jerusalem לַעֲשׂ֣וֹת <S%H6213><s%> la-'a-Sot [and] to do רָ֔ע <S%H7451><s%> Ra', worse מִן־ <S%H4480><s%> min- more הַ֨גּוֹיִ֔ם <S%H1471><s%> hag-go-Yim, than the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher whom הִשְׁמִ֣יד <S%H8045><s%> hish-Mid had destroyed יְהוָ֔ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh, whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mip-pe-Nei before בְּנֵ֥י <S%H1121><s%> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El. of Israel פ Peh

וַיְדַבֵּ֧ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֛ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מְנַשֶּׁ֥ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh to Manasseh וְאֶל־ <S%H413><s%> ve-'el- and עַמּ֖וֹ <S%H5971><s%> am-Mo and to his people וְלֹ֥א <S%H3808><s%> ve-Lo no הִקְשִֽׁיבוּ׃ <S%H7181><s%> hik-Shi-vu. but they would not hearken

וַיָּבֵ֨א <S%H935><s%> vai-ya-Ve brought יְהוָ֜ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh Wherefore the LORD עֲלֵיהֶ֗ם <S%H5921><s%> 'a-lei-Hem, against אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- שָׂרֵ֤י <S%H8269><s%> sa-Rei upon them the captains of הַצָּבָא֙ <S%H6635><s%> hatz-tza-Va the host of אֲשֶׁר֙ <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher after לְמֶ֣לֶךְ <S%H4428><s%> le-Me-lech the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <S%H804><s%> 'ash-Shur, of Assyria וַיִּלְכְּד֥וּ <S%H3920><s%> vai-yil-ke-Du which took אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מְנַשֶּׁ֖ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh Manasseh בַּחֹחִ֑ים <S%H2336><s%> ba-cho-Chim; among the thorns וַיַּֽאַסְרֻ֙הוּ֙ <S%H631><s%> vai-ya-'as-Ru-hu and bound him בַּֽנְחֻשְׁתַּ֔יִם <S%H5178><s%> ban-chush-Ta-yim, with fetters וַיּוֹלִיכֻ֖הוּ <S%H1980><s%> vai-yo-li-Chu-hu and took בָּבֶֽלָה׃ <S%H894><s%> ba-Ve-lah. him to Babylon

וּכְהָצֵ֣ר <S%H6887><s%> u-che-ha-Tzer And when he was in affliction ל֔וֹ lo, חִלָּ֕ה <S%H2470><s%> chil-Lah he besought אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- פְּנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> pe-Nei before יְהוָ֣ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהָ֑יו <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hav; his God וַיִּכָּנַ֣ע <S%H3665><s%> vai-yik-ka-Na' and humbled מְאֹ֔ד <S%H3966><s%> me-'Od, himself greatly מִלִּפְנֵ֖י <S%H6440><s%> mil-lif-Nei accept אֱלֹהֵ֥י <S%H430><s%> 'e-lo-Hei the God אֲבֹתָֽיו׃ <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav. of his fathers

וַיִּתְפַּלֵּ֣ל <S%H6419><s%> vai-yit-pal-Lel And prayed אֵלָ֗יו <S%H413><s%> 'e-Lav, to him וַיֵּעָ֤תֶר <S%H6279><s%> vai-ye-'A-ter unto him and he was intreated לוֹ֙ lo וַיִּשְׁמַ֣ע <S%H8085><s%> vai-yish-Ma' of him and heard תְּחִנָּת֔וֹ <S%H8467><s%> te-chin-na-To, his supplication וַיְשִׁיבֵ֥הוּ <S%H7725><s%> vay-shi-Ve-hu and brought him again יְרוּשָׁלִַ֖ם <S%H3389><s%> ye-ru-sha-Lim to Jerusalem לְמַלְכוּת֑וֹ <S%H4438><s%> le-mal-chu-To; into his kingdom וַיֵּ֣דַע <S%H3045><s%> vai-Ye-da' knew מְנַשֶּׁ֔ה <S%H4519><s%> me-nash-Sheh, Then Manasseh כִּ֥י <S%H3588><s%> ki that יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh that the LORD ה֥וּא <S%H1931><s%> hu he הָֽאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <S%H430><s%> Ha-'E-lo-Him. he [was] God
